page.title: 04SHOPPING
page.content: On the 4th July 1985 we went to Bolas and did a survey on shopping.We had quite a selection of answers,the answers varied from different towns and counties.Most people go to Wolverhampton to do there shopping. Wolverhampton is 40km south_east of Bolas,there nearest shop is in Waters_upton which is 2km south_west of Bolas.We asked them if they would like a shop nearer to them they said yes it would be more convenient some said no because there would be to much trouble if there was a shop any nearer to them.
